createAuction(uint256,uint256,uint64,uin.details: Assumes tokenizedBitcoin (sBTC) has already been transferred to this contract.

params.baseParams: Base parameters for the liquidity deposit.
params.deadline: The timestamp after which the auction expires.
params.decayBlocks: The number of blocks over which the auction price decays.
params.endcbsBTCperBTCRate: The ending sBTC per BTC rate (WAD 1e18).
params.fillerWhitelistContract: Optional contract to whitelist auction fillers.
params.startsBTCperBTCRate: The starting sBTC per BTC rate (WAD 1e18).

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).
params.receiver: The address that will receive the tokens.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to transfer.

params.amount: The amount of native tokens to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).
params.receiver: The address that will receive the native tokens.

BUNDLER3().notice: The address of the Bundler3 contract.

btcAuctionHouse().notice: Returns the address of the BTC Dutch Auction House contract targeted by the adaptor.

createAuction(uint256,uint256,uint64,uin.notice: Creates a Dutch auction on the BTCDutchAuctionHouse using the adaptor's tokenizedBitcoin balance.

tokenizedBitcoin().notice: Returns the address of the tokenized BTC token contract used by the adaptor.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,struct DutchAuctionParams memory,struct BaseCreateOrderParams memory) external
